title: GLAM-Workbench/trove-lists
description:
Current version: v1.0.0

Jupyter notebooks to work with data from Trove’s public lists and tags. See the GLAM Workbench for more details.

Notebook topics

Lists

  • Convert a Trove list into a CSV file – extracts list data from the Trove API and saves the results as CSV files (with separate files for newspaper articles and other resources); optionally save OCRd test, PDFs, and images of any listed newspaper articles.
  • Convert a Trove list into a CollectionBuilder exhibition – converts Trove lists into a series of files that can be uploaded to a CollectionBuilder-GH repository to create an instant exhibition.
  • Harvest summary data from Trove lists – extract and analyse data from all public lists in Trove

Tags

  • Harvest public tags from Trove zones – assemble a dataset containing all public tags added to Trove
  • Analyse public tags added to Trove – explore ways of analysing and visualising the complete dataset of public tags added to Trove resources
